title: Impact of Polystyrene Microplastic Carriers on the Toxicity of Pb2+ towards Freshwater Planarian Dugesia japonica
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00991B, Paper
Changjian Xie, Xiaowei Li, Yiqing Chen, Xin Wu, Haiyang Chen, Shujing Zhang, Libo Jiang, Qiuxiang Pang, Samina Irshad, Zhiling Guo, Iseult Lynch, Peng Zhang
The global concern over ecological contamination from microplastics (MPs) and heavy metals prompts apprehensions about environmental integrity and human well-being. Yet, the co-exposure of MPs and toxic metals in the...
